org.apache.webapp.balancer
Class BaseRule

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.webapp.balancer.BaseRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
AcceptEverythingRule, CharacterEncodingRule, RemoteAddressRule, RequestAttributeRule, RequestHeaderRule, RequestParameterRule, SessionAttributeRule, URLStringMatchRule, UserRoleRule
public abstract class BaseRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule

The BaseRule is an empty rule implementation which can be subclassed for extension.

Author:
Yoav Shapira
